MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA14 area of Port Glasgow, affecting properties in Princes Street and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:45am due to a fault on our underground electricity network on Princes Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:13am on Sunday, 01 November 2020
